title: NAFISUL HAQUE KAHN
section_paragraph: A creative visualizer turned full-stack web developer with 3 years of design experience. I combine strong visual sense with modern frontend and backend development to build clean, functional, and user-focused web experiences.

title: THE TECHNOLOGIES
section_paragraph: The tools and technologies I use to design, build, and deploy modern web applications—covering frontend, backend, databases, and design workflows.

title: THE PROJECTS
section_paragraph: A collection of projects that reflect my problem-solving skills, technical expertise, and attention to design—built using modern web technologies and real-world use cases.

title: THE EXPERIENCES
section_paragraph: My professional journey—from creative visualizer to web developer—highlighting hands-on experience, responsibilities, and the skills gained along the way.

title: THE CONNECTIONS
section_paragraph: Let's work together. Reach out to discuss projects, collaborations, or opportunities—I'm always open to meaningful conversations.
